sentences.cn: ...一种愁苦的、挥之不去的悲叹。

sentences.en: But I would not sadden you by the mortal plaint.
sentences.cn: 但我不愿以生命必有终结的哀叹使你悲伤.

sentences.en: Educated youth by it is to plaint oneself are broken cannot so, must seek a breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 知青由是感叹自己断不能如是, 必须求突破.

sentences.en: I often had this kind of plaint.
Perhaps you should plaint what the high - tech technology of this world develops is really fast.
sentences.cn: 也许你要感叹这个世界的高科技技术发展的真快.

sentences.en: To him I will bring my plaint.
Work one year, did not make next money? This is many farmers plaint and doubt.
sentences.cn: 忙活一年, 没挣下钱? 这是不少农民的感叹和疑问.

trans.tran_en: A plaint is a complaint or a sad cry
